isnt the -su command the one that gives: i cant mount my dvd rom for some reason
DO you have a CD in it?
Is it data or music or?
What kind of CD is it?
You can not mount a music CD.
Music CD's do not have the same sort of filesystem that data CD's have. You don't mount music CD's, you "play" music CDs
NP
sd card?  What is that?
What are  you trying to do?
What OS?
Ubuntu 7.10
What version?  ...You probably need to update your system.
YOu can more than likely mount it manually.
sudo mount /dev/sda1 /mnt/floppy
ls /mnt/floppy
If it is not sda1 you will need to check  to see what it is:  sudo fdisk -l /dev/sd*
And once it is mounted, you can take your browser to /mnt/floppy
But, you will need to close the browser or file manager and manually un-mount it when you are done.
umount /dev/sda1
sudo su -
sudo su -i
sudo su -
